##  About My FYP Project
![](images/IHIS.jpg){fig-alt="Photo of Shang Jay at IHIS" style="width:40%; border-radius:16px;"}

**My FYP project was a 6 months internship at Synapxe Pte Ltd, formerly known as Integrated Health Information System (IHiS). Synapxe is a healthcare technology company that provides digital solutions to improve healthcare delivery in Singapore.**

## Intern Responsibility
![](images/working.jpg){fig-alt="Photo of Shang Jay working" style="width:40%; border-radius:16px;"}

- **Worked in a team supporting the Next Generation Electronic Medical Records (NGEMR) Go-Live Project at Tan Tock Seng Hospital and >10 affiliated healthcare clinics across Singapore.**
- **Provided on-site end-user support for healthcare staff across hospitals and clinics.**
- **Conducted application testing and troubleshooting on end-user devices.**
- **Assisted many nurses and doctors in adapting to the new NGEMR system.**
